verses.name: Judges 9:20
verses.text: But if not, let fire come out from Abimelech, and devour the men of Shechem, and the house of Millo; and let fire come out from the men of Shechem, and from the house of Millo, and devour Abimelech.

verses.name: Judges 9:21
verses.text: And Jotham ran away, and fled, and went to Beer, and dwelt there, for fear of Abimelech his brother.

verses.name: Judges 9:22
verses.text: When Abimelech had reigned three years over Israel,

verses.name: Judges 9:23
verses.text: Then God sent an evil spirit between Abimelech and the men of Shechem; and the men of Shechem dealt treacherously with Abimelech:
